description.value: This supports the recording of effective start and end dates.

purpose.value: This extension extends a resource to record the effective dates which are currently not supported by the FHIR standard.

short.value: To carry effective start and end dates

definition.value: An extension which carries effective start and end dates.
To record effective start and end dates
